subject: am sweep capture of past spiricom spirit communicator
author: bhali333
full_text:
hey everybody,

I did an am sweep session on 8-30-07 and recieved a message from a 
spirit that was communicating during the spiricom project many years 
ago his name was doc mueller. I have posted some info on him from the 
world itc page also a audio file of a spiricom communication and the 
file that I captured. please give a listen and let me know what you 
think.

the files are in the folder "doc mueller" in the files section.

bruce
